summary:
YuiH StandAlone Follower Season2

Character
====================================================
Lynea - Fighter, 1H combat warrior
Valhalla - Barbarian, 2H weapons specialist
Merura - Attack support
Falari - Destruction Magic, fire ball machine gun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Pogp8OF.jpg[/img]
[youtube]ZPoZ_-NQkWg[/youtube] 

[size=1][color=#ffff00]Big thanks to hodilton's video !! [/color][/size][/center]

Hello! My name is YuiH(spell Yui "H", single H), I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

[b]*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*
[/b]
[b][size=5][color=#f6b26b][Character][/color]
[/size][/b][size=4][b][color=#6d9eeb][img]http://i.imgur.com/bek91hJ.jpg[/img]
Lynea[/color]
[/b][/size]Height 0.97 Weight 0
[b]Location: [/b]Whiterun The Drunken Huntsman
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] Steel Armor
[b]Weapon: [/b]Steel Sword
[b]Combat style: [/b]Fighter, 1H combat warrior
[b]Perk: [/b]Deflect Arrows, Deadly Bash, Armsman, Bladesman, Dual Flurry, Agile Defender, Deft Movement

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8][size=1]When I create her, I image she is a loyalty housecarl just like Lydia, military and noble family, strong also has elegant face,
have good feel on create her face, not get so many trouble.[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4W4BQvL.jpg[/img]
[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Valhalla
[/size][/color][/b]Height 1.02 Weight 100
[b]Location: [/b]Falkreath Dead Man's Drink
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] Prisoner Clothes
[b]Weapon: [/b]No
[b]Combat style: [/b]Barbarian, 2H weapons specialist
[b]Perk: [/b]Reflect Blows, Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery, Barbarian, Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher, Champion's Stance, Devastating Blow, Great Critical Charge, Sweep
[color=#ffff00]*She starting on level 20, but she didn't have any equipment, so you have to give her one.
[/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:[/b]
[color=#d8d8d8][size=1]I always thinking... was hair help me a lot when I create character, I wanna show myself "not really", so I decide to create a bald character.
When I create her, I image she was a bandits leader, always target on Imperial supplies, one day she been attack by Thalmor and Imperial,
They capture her, kill all her men, torture her, shaved her hair, she find a chance and ran out to the Skyrim.[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ElzwWqC.jpg[/img]
[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Merura
[/b][/size][/color]Height 0.88 Weight 0
[b]Location: [/b]Whiterun The Bannered Mare
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] Blacksmith's Apron
[b]Weapon: [/b]Merura's lucky pickaxe
[b]Combat style: [/b]Attack support, her perk not so much powerful, but she will help you knock down your enemy with her pickaxe,
and she can't be knock down, so hope will help a lot.
[b]Perk: [/b]Hack and Slash, Bone Breaker, Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:
[/b][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]She is my second formal character, and took the most of time on her face, the child face is very hard to edit,
and very hard to get perfect every angle (even now I still not sure her face is fine or not).
When I create her, I image she is a Nord, born in Skyrim, loss of child memory, only felt her parents was killed by bandits,
she was a blacksmith apprentice, and she got the talent, but as a Nord, her skinny and little body make everyone despise her,
so no one see her talent, finally she got fired, in desperation, she went to The Bannered Mare and buy a drink.
(Yep, her age already can drink.)[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[img]http://i.imgur.com/y1e7xfy.jpg[/img]
[color=#e06666][size=4][b]Falari
[/b][/size][/color]Height 0.97 Weight 0
[b]Location: [/b]Winterhold The Frozen Hearth
[b]Default Outfit:[/b] College Robes
[b]Weapon: [/b]No
[b]Combat style: [/b]Destruction Magic, fire of mage
[b]Spell: [/b]Firebolt, Incinerate, Flame Cloak
[b]Perk: [/b]Expert Destruction, Augmented Flames, Impact, Intense Flames

-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:
[/b][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]Her face base is Ciceria, a little bit wild but not crazy, kinda quick work, don't take much time, so maybe still need revise.
I image She is a arrogant girl ( Tsundere? ), so I make her mouth a little bit different, hope that will make her a little more unique.
When I create her, I image she is a talent fire mage, heard about The College Of Winterhold so she went to the Skyrim and dmission to the college,
but she really can't stand of the cold weather of Skyrim, so she quit and decide leaving the Skyrim,
but she find out she spend most of her money on college, so she stuck in the Frozen Hearth.
After create the Sha, I always wanna create another mage, and no area spell this time,
and I t[/size][/color][color=#d8d8d8][size=1]hought about "Conjure Flame Atronach" spell but, seem Flame Atronach will explode when they die,
I hate that, because I will got damage because of that, so I didn't give her that spell, so she just sample a fire ball machine gun.[/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=4]Omage EX Character:[/size][/color][/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/PCSIUWo.jpg[/img]
[color=#ff0000][size=4]Valhalla [/size][b]([/b][/color][b][color=#ff0000]pre ver.) [/color][color=#ffff00][size=2]Only for v1.0, will update another day.[/size][/color][/b]
[size=2]Height 1.02 Weight 100
[b]Location: [/b]Windhelm Candlehearth Hall
[b]Default Outfit: [/b]Banded Iron Armor
[b]Weapon: [/b]Steel battleaxe
[b]Combat style: [/b]Barbarian, 2H weapons specialist
[b]Perk: [/b]Juggernaut. Dual Flurry, Dual Savagery, Barbarian, Limbsplitter, Skullcrusher, Champion's Stance, Devastating Blow, Great Critical Charge, Sweep, Power Bash, Deflect Arrows

[color=#ffff00]*You can decide to install this or not, before you download "[b]Omage EX character - Valhalla pre ver for S2 v1_0[/b]" file,
you [b]most install main file first[/b], and the body type will follow the main file, and you will also have normal ver and pre ver in the game. [/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/DgksiNr.jpg[/img]
[/size]-------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Character design comment:
[/b][color=#d8d8d8][size=1][b][color=#ffff00]"Back time....when Valhalla still a bandits leader."
[/color][/b]Back time when Valhalla still a bandits leader and had hair, the face is more soft and more smile,
and different with normal ver, her stats is a little bit weak. [/size][/color]
-------------------------------------------------------------------------



[color=#f6b26b][size=5][b][Recommended mod][/b][/size][/color]

Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only
And author of the original creator of the original Mod by Ren, apachii, PeggyZone, NewSeaSims, Nani0427

[b][color=#f6b26b][size=5][Change log]
[/size][/color][/b]2014.09.23 - v1.0 Release.
2014.09.25 - Omage EX v1.0 Release.
2014.09.28 - Each character can choose different body type now
                    Merura change default outfit to vanilla clothes, you can put any armor/clothes on her what you want.
                    Change Valhalla Level Mult from 1.2 to 1.0.
